publications.title: Derivation of Three Clones from Human Embryonic Stem Cell Lines by FACS Sorting and Their Characterization

genomic_characterisation.summary: Karyotype of hESC clones 3.1, 3.2, and 3.3 at passage 10 is normal 46XX; three germ layers observed in teratomas.
